text: Malus komarovii is an apple species of flowering plant, in the family Rosaceae. It is native to China, Manchuria, and North Korea. ;Conservation Malus komarovii is threatened by habitat loss, and is on the IUCN Red List. ==References== komarovii Category:Flora of China Category:Flora of Manchuria Category:Flora of North Korea Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Malus komarovii
